amendatorysection.para: An aggrieved party may secure a review of any final judgment of the district court under sections 79-288 to 79-291 by appeal as provided in the Administrative Procedure Act.

annotation.para: A party aggrieved by a district court's final judgment under the student suspension or expulsion act may appeal as provided in this section. Maack v. School Dist. of Lincoln, 241 Neb. 847, 491 N.W.2d 341 (1992).
